name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Univer ClipSheet - An AI-driven one-click solution for web scraping

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use AI to help you extract all table data from public web pages and generate sheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚óè We use Univer Sheet to present this data, making it easier for you to copy, paste, share, and manage the data.

-----Features:-----
1. Extract the Trending list from YouTube.
2. Extract financial market data from Yahoo Finance.
3. Extract product prices, user reviews, and other information from Amazon.
4. Extract news tracking and historical event data from CNN.
5. Extract post data or comments from Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.
6. Univer Clipsheet works with any website or browser-based application.

-----Website:-----
https://univer.ai/clipsheet

-----FAQ:-----
1. Community Support
Community group: https://discord.gg/rbZcJPm4un

2. I used Univer ClipSheet to extract table data with hyperlinks, but I want to further extract data from these hyperlinks.
You can use the data completion feature in Univer Sheet to achieve bulk extraction of detailed information.
Tutorials: https://univer.ai/clipsheet/tutorials/completion

3. Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
No, you do not need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account. We select the most suitable AI engine to achieve the best data extraction results for you.

4. Is my data secure?
We guarantee that we will not use your collected data in any way. Your data security is our top priority.
Privacy Policy: https://univer.ai/legal/privacy-policy
